0: Upon arrival I requested a renovated room
We were told it was one of the newly renovated rooms
We stayed in a renovated deluxe King room New Years week
The rooms are renovated and the staff is ALWAYS friendly and accommodating
Room had a charming mix of updated bedding and amenities with older classic lounge chair ottoman and bedroom bench type furniture
it is a beautifully renovated historic hotel in the middle of the city
1: I am excited for the lobby renovation
Booked this hotel because it was on sale but the fact that they were doing renovations and nickle and dime you for everything still did not make it a good value
It looks like a pretty cool hotel but they are under renovation
I am sure once the renovations are complete it will be beautiful however I am not sure that they will update their discounted quote rooms which is a shame
Hopefully they comp some folks after the remodeling is done
I actually first knew about the renovations from prior reviews
At the time of this review they are in the middle of renovations
One of the better hotels in downtown Cincy will be great once renovations are complete
2: Maintenance was on the way for 2 days but they were a no show so was the management apparently the do n’t work at night
Rooms were oddly shaped with tiny windows but clean and updated
Also the bathroom showed a considerable amount of wear and tear despite this being a recently renovated property see picture
For a newly renovated property one would think they would have this type of issue
The hotel seems to have lost some character in the renovation

Nice hotel recently updated lobby and restaurants and some room renovations as well although they could have done better with the rooms as it appears they went cheap on the flooring in the bedroom half of the room also mini bar was non existent would have thought a room at this price point would have at least had a couple bottles of water for guest
Some of the mechanics need updating
Then the room was dirty hairs in shower and sink areas sticky floors toilet not secured to floor updates were cheaply done and tv did n’t work
It ’s a historic property but does appear to need a refresh
They have updated furnishing but they have not really kept up the walls and moldings well
